attributes.action: vunerable groups forced adoption intimation of these groups falsifying evidence,
attributes.additional_details: ,so instead of helping councils are taking away kids ignoring careplans ,all false evidence supplier/ judges who accept false evidence should be jailed.kids should be handed back,there needs to be someone appointed to check the 20,000 or more kids adopted in the last 6 years,under micheal gove ,most mothers have harrowing storys ,of certain cafass officer falsifying evidence ,and given the chance will prove it,
attributes.background: these mothers have been,intimiated bullied ,false evidence has been  supplied to the courts, by cafcass and the social services, some judges have intentional passed up false evidence for profit, people may just need help,care which has been cut by the tories,
